translations.translation: hearkening to its Lord as it is bound to do!
And hearkens to its Lord and is dutiful,
and hearkens to the command of its Lord, doing what it should;
in obedience to the commands of their Lord which are incumbent on them,
And it listens to the command of its Lord – and that befits it.
And listens to and obeys its Lord -- and it must do so.
And obeys its Lord and it must.
and gives ear to its Lord, and is fitly disposed;
And attentive to her Lord in fear,
and obeys its Lord as it must,
And it hearkeneth to its Lord, and is duteous,
and gives ear to its Lord as it should.
And hearkens to (the Command of) its Lord, and it must needs (do so);-
And listens and obeys its Lord, and it must do so;
hearing and obeying its Lord, as it must do;
And hearkens to its Lord, as it must.
And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]
[84:2] and heeds, gives ear to and, in rending itself asunder, obeys, its Lord as it should, that is, as its duty is to heed and obey,
(And attentive) and it obeys and listens (to her Lord in fear) and it befits her to do so,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
أخبرنا أبو جعفر
 قال: حدّثنا علي بن أحمد
 قال: حدَّثنا عطاء بن السّائب عن أبي خالد عن زيد بن علي عليهما السّلامُ في قولهِ تعالى: { وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ } معناه سَمِعتْ
 وحُقَّتْ: معناه حُقَّ لَها أن تَسمعَ

translations.translation:
Abu Ja'far told us.


{He said:} Ali ibn Ahmad told us


He said: "It was narrated to us by 'Ata' ibn al-Sa'ib from Abu Khalid from Zayd ibn Ali, may peace be upon them, regarding the saying of Allah, {And she has submitted to her Lord and has been decreed [by Him]} - its meaning is that she has heard [His command]."

{She} is entitled: {It} {is} her right to {hear}

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا } أي: أصغت وانقادت لحم ربها وأمره الذي مضى على انشقاقها { وَ } بعدما أمرت { حُقَّتْ } [الانشقاق: 2] لها
 ولاقت بحالها أن امتثلت بالمأمور وانقادت

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وأَذِنَتْ لربها } أي: استمعت
 وفي الحديث:
 " ما أَذِنَ اللهُ لشيءٍ إذنه لنبيٍّ يتغَنَّى بالقرآن " 
أي: ما استمع
 أي: انقادت وأذعنت لتأثير قدرته تعالى حين تعلّقت إرادته بانشقاقها ولم تأبَ ولم تمتنع
 { وحُقَّتْ } أي: وحقَّ لها أن تسمع وتطيع لأمر ربها
 إذ هي مصنوعة مربوبة لله تعالى
